INSERT INTO ORDER_PICT_MES ( ID, INSIDE_ORDER, PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, SERIAL, PICTURES, FILE_PATH, LINK_PATH, DESC, SEND_EMP, SEND_DATE, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictures,jdbcType=unkown}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_ORDER_PICT_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE ORDER_PICT_MES
INSIDE_ORDER = #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERIAL = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURES = #{pictures,jdbcType=unkown},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINK_PATH = #{linkPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_EMP = #{sendEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_DATE = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
